attributes.action: That the free bus pass allows travel into Wales and Scotland plus limited restrictions lifted
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Free bus, should allow those over 60 and those with disabilties the right to travle and use the pass in England, Scotland and Wales.
Plus a standarisation of current local councils, users say in some areas where half price rail fare is excepted, that this applies to all on production of bus pass and also use of Metro services for visitors other than restricted to local area residents.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
